CustomField.description: will contain the concatenated list of pending milestones for a deal
CustomField.formula: IF(M1__c = false,"1. Initial spend being incurred" & BR(),"") & IF(M2__c = false,"2. Asia Partners Meeting Passed" & BR(),"") & IF(M3__c = false,"3. First IC Meeting Passed" & BR(),"") & IF(M4__c = false,"4. DD Expense Approved by IC" & BR(),"") & IF(M5__c = false,"5. Exclusivity Signed" & BR(),"") & IF(M6__c = false,"6. Definitive Agreement Signed" & BR(),"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please do not add this to any layout
CustomField.label: pending_milestones
